modName: Phoenix Design - Expert Robes Replacer Female
summary: This is a mod to replace the female Expert Robes. It is a phoenix-like design on black robes with gold trim.
descriptionHtml:
******
Updates
> Added an alternate color scheme - black trim instead of gold.
> Fixed a problem with folder arrangement in the original.

*****

- I am new to modding and decided to make my own design for some female college robes. It\'s a simple retexture of the Expert Robes, with the robe colors changed to black and gold with a white phoenix design on the front and back. This is my first version.

- To be clear, *this replaces all female Expert Robes in the game*.

- To install just place in your Skyrim Data folder. There are two .dds files included (texture and normalmap) and a .nif (mesh). Make sure you put everything in the indicated folders.

- If you are wondering why I included a .nif file:
Two sets of robes, Expert and Master Robes, share the same normalmap. I made my own normalmap for my Expert Robes and don\'t want it to apply on the Master Robes, so I had to modify the mesh file so it points to the correct file. Just include all the files in the folder I provided and everything should work fine.

- Here\'s the console command to add a set of Expert Robes to your inventory:

player.additem 0010D662 1

- This is my first mod so feel free to comment/provide feedback. There shouldn\'t be any bugs or issues, but please comment if you have questions. If there is any interest I might make more designs. I am open to suggestions. Thanks for checking it out!
author: gekks

files.name: Phoenix Design - Female Expert Robes Replacer
